thread.section_title: Sunwave gas+power Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Sunwave gas+power | www.gosunwave.com | 2 of 5
thread.title: Ms. Angela
thread.title_full: Sunwave gas+power reviewed by Ms. Angela

author: Ms. Angela
title: Ms. Angela
text:
I shop for fixed energy rates a few times a year now. I've been doing this for several years. Why the majority of the people I know, are not doing the same, is beyond me.
Sunwave Always has the best/lowest rates. On top of that, their staff are extremely friendly and courteous.
I recently discovered that they will even lower your existing "fixed" rate if you see a better current price that they are offering. Shazam! Can't beat that!
